name: Laser Crusher Gauntlet
description:
Made for Epic MegaJam 2021 based on the theme of "Running Out of Space."

This entry is a first person platformer where you must avoid various hazards that can crush or zap you. Made by solo developer. 

Use Keyboard and Mouse or Controller to play.

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • WASD to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • L Ctrl to Crouch
  • R to Restart
  • Esc to Quit

Gamepad:

  • L Stick to Move
  • R Stick to Look
  • A to Jump
  • B to Crouch

Note: There is NO audio implemented in this game so there's nothing wrong with your speaker or headphones.
